comments.message: Hi Brian, interesting post! Any chance you could find an image to go along with it? Images help grab attention and tell a story with higher impact. You should be able to use the Update Entry button on the right of your post and follow the instructions to add images from there. We know occasionally people have issues uploading images so let us know by hitting the Feedback button at the bottom of most pages of our site if you face any problems. Looking forward to seeing more of your inspiring insights on OpenIDEO. And here's some tips on adding visual goodness to your idea: http://ideo.pn/vis-uals plus more on evolving your thought-starter: http://ideo.pn/oi-evolve

description: This is more towards on the survivors on Ebola but for those that have survived, the medical experts should keep in contact weekly for a month, than monthly, to make sure that symptoms don't come back and we won't have another outbreak.
summary: To fully solve the problem, we have to fully understand what happens before, during, and after someone is infected.
title: Understand and Follow through
